casebody.data:
KYLES
v.
The GOODYEAR TIRE & RUBBER CO. 438P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2017 Kathleen G. Sumner, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Kyles, Anthony M. Matthew J. Ledwith, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co., et al.

M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte.

Phillip A. Baddour, III.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of December 2017 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of December 2017."
